cards.title: The Fourth Ring
cards.text: React, Boot: After your dude succeeds at a spell pull while not at home, you may discard a card from your hand to gain 1 ghost rock and draw a card.

cards.title: Law Dogs
cards.text: Noon, Boot: Choose a dude. Boot your dudes with a total influence greater than the chosen dude's influence to raise that dude's bounty by 1.

cards.title: Morgan Cattle Co.
cards.text: Noon, Boot: Boot your dude to play a deed, reducing that deed's cost by that dude's influence, and move that dude to that deed.

cards.title: The Sloane Gang
cards.text: Noon, Boot: Boot your dude in the town square. If that dude is still in the town square during the Sundown phase, either gain 1 ghost rock per other player, or your dude permanently gets 1 control point if they do not already have one.

cards.title: Micah Ryse
cards.text: Noon: Boot a Hex on Micah to move him (without booting).
cards.flavor:
"Does he ever smile?"
"I don't think you'd want to see the kind of thing that makes him smile."

cards.title: Mongwau the Mighty
cards.text: Shootout: Discard a Hex from Mongwau to make him a stud.
cards.flavor: "Step right up and see the mystic fortitude of my mighty magic… you damned ignorant buffoons."

cards.title: Bobo
cards.text: Bobo gains a bullet bonus equal to the highest Huckster skill rating in play.
cards.flavor: I don't know where he came from, but that clown creeps me out.

cards.title: Arnold McCadish
cards.text: React, Pull, Boot: When a dude is discarded (not aced) as a casualty in a shootout, if the pull is higher than the dude's value, send that dude home booted instead.
cards.flavor: "You know what they say… 37th time's the charm."

cards.title: The Ghostly Gun
cards.text: Resolution: Put The Ghostly Gun into your draw hand; he becomes the suit and value of your choice. Discard a card from your draw hand.
cards.flavor: "He is a man of few words, but his guns speak volumes." - Ivor Hawley

cards.title: Avie Cline
cards.flavor: "Pancho's been at that circus three times this week.  Boy must really love clowns." - Fred Aims

cards.title: Kevin Wainwright
cards.text: Noon: Move Kevin (without booting) to the same location as a Huckster. Kevin becomes a stud.
cards.flavor: "Little guy follows Mr. Hawley everywhere he goes.  It'd be adorable if it wasn't so darned creepy." - Lucy Clover

cards.title: Tyxarglenak
cards.text: Other players cannot choose or affect your Hucksters at this location with action cards if they could legally choose to affect Tyxarglenak instead.
cards.flavor: "Come on now Tyx.  There's work to be done." - Ivor Hawley

cards.title: Jia Mein
cards.text: Shootout: Attach a Hex to Jia Mein (paying all costs) to make him a stud.
cards.flavor: "You must be strong enough to control the powers you call forth.  Let the mask on your scarred face be a constant reminder of your weakness." - Ivor Hawley

cards.title: Ivor Hawley
cards.text: While he has a Hex, Ivor gets +1 bullets, +1 influence, and +1 Huckster skill.
cards.flavor: "Here in the fourth ring you will see wonders that will change you forever!  Come one, come all, to our travelin circus!"

cards.title: Lucinda "Lucy" Clover
cards.text: If your opponent in Lucy's shootout reveals a cheatin' hand, raise the bounty on each dude in their posse by 1 (including from 0 to 1).
cards.flavor: "The storm took everything from that girl.  Not much scares her anymore." - Abram Grothe

cards.title: Judge Harry Somerset
cards.text: Noon Job, Boot: Harry leads a job that marks a wanted dude. If successful, ace the mark.

cards.title: Philip Swinford
cards.text: Each time a player reveals a cheatin' hand and your hand is legal, you may discard a card from your play hand to draw a card.
cards.flavor: "This town'll take the shine offa him soon enough." - Dave Montreal

cards.title: Tommy Harden
cards.text:
If your opponent in Tommy's shootout reveals a cheatin' hand, raise your draw hand rank by 1 for this round.
If your draw hand is also legal, raise your hand rank by 2 instead.
cards.flavor: "Sweetrock had plenty of guys like Tommy on the payroll.  Some of them actually worked for the company, too." - Max Baine

cards.title: Prescott Utter
cards.text: Prescott's bullets and influence are equal to the number of Law Dogs at his location (including himself).
cards.flavor: "It seems that everyone has a vice in this town.  At least Mr. Utter's doesn't keep him from doing what's right." - Abram Grothe

cards.title: Andreas Andregg
cards.flavor: "Claims he was a beekeeper back East, but I've never heard of a beekeeper who could handle a gatling pistol like that." - Abram Grothe

cards.title: Xiong "Wendy" Cheng
cards.text: Shootout, Boot: Send an opposing dude home booted.
cards.flavor: "Poor girl's lost every happiness imaginable.  All that's left for her is to make sure no one suffers the same fate." - Abram Grothe

cards.title: Clyde Owens
cards.text: Noon: Clyde calls out a dude at his location. A wanted dude cannot refuse the call out.
cards.flavor: "It's s shame Clyde can't control his drinking.  He'd have my job if he could just keep sober." - Dave Montreal

cards.title: Abram Grothe
cards.text: Noon Job, Boot: Mark a Holy Ground deed. If successful, discard all Abominations and wanted dudes at that deed.
cards.flavor: "Why a sword?  Easy... swords never run out of bullets."

cards.title: Sheriff Dave Montreal
cards.text: If your opponent in Dave's shootout reveals a cheatin' hand and you do not, your dudes cannot be casualties this round.
cards.flavor: "It's taking all he has to hold this town together. Let's see what happens when we start pulling on threads." - Jonah Essex

cards.title: Irving Patterson
cards.text: When Irving joins a posse, gain 1 ghost rock.
cards.flavor: "Them beeves sell big no matter where you go.  Makes ya wonder what they put in the feed." - Tommy Harden

cards.title: Prof. Eustace True
cards.text: Noon: Discard a Gadget from Eustace to move him to another location (without booting).
cards.flavor: "If Mrs. Morgan wants this done on time, tell her I need to be left alone to do my work!"

cards.title: Elander Boldman
cards.text: Shootout, Pull: Choose your dude with a Weapon Gadget in this shootout. If the pull is a club, discard that dude. Otherwise, that Gadget gets +3 bullets.

cards.title: James Ghetty
cards.text: When James enters a posse, place 4 ghost rock on him. The ghost rock may be used to pay for Shootout abilities (it is not a bounty). Discard his unused ghost rock after the shootout.
cards.flavor: "He always seems to have a trick up his sleeve." - Max Baine

cards.title: Jon Longstride
cards.text: Noon: Unboot Jon's Horse. You may use the Horse's ability an additional time.
cards.flavor: "Mrs. Morgan hired me to take care of the horses, Mr. Baine.  I need you to approve my request for a new stable."

cards.title: Lane Healey
cards.text: Lane gets +2 bullets while he has a Horse.
cards.flavor: "Max, I understand the need for security, but if Healey keeps interfering with the law, he's gonna end up on the wrong side of it." - Dave Montreal

cards.title: Jarrett Blake
cards.text: Shootout: If Jarrett has a Horse, swap him with one of your dudes in the posse (Jarrett joins the posse. The other dude moves to Jarrett's location and is no longer in the posse).
cards.flavor: "No matter how far we progress, men like Jarrett will always be the heart and soul of this company." - Max Baine

cards.title: Harold Aimslee
cards.text: Noon, Boot: Discard a card from your hand to get a non-Weapon Gadget from your discard pile. Show the card and add it to your hand.

cards.title: Rémy LaPointe
cards.text: Shootout, Pay 1–4 Ghost Rock: Rémy gets +1 bullets for each ghost rock spent, to a maximum rating of 5 bullets.
cards.flavor: "Mon pistolet parle la langue universelle."

cards.title: Max Baine
cards.text:
Max is worth 1 control point while you control 2 or more Ranches.
Your other dudes at Ranches get +1 influence and +3 value.
cards.flavor: "Nathaniel Morgan's legacy is brimming with potential.  And it's the greatest hope this town has of a future."

cards.title: Allie Hensman
cards.text: Noon, Boot: If Allie is at the town square, she permanently gets 1 control point.
cards.flavor: "Stay in the town, blend in.  You're worth more as a pair of eyes than a gun." - Jonah Essex

cards.title: Fred Aims
cards.text: Fred's influence is equal to his bounty.
cards.flavor: "I don't rob banks because I need the money.  I do it cause it ticks off those rich, uppity types.  The money's just a nice bonus."

cards.title: Lawrence Blackwood
cards.text: Noon, Boot: If Lawrence is at a deed you do not own, he is worth 1 control point while he stays at that deed.
cards.flavor: "An ex-Confederate scout.  Only match for his skill at getting out of trouble is his skill at getting into it." - Jonah Essex

cards.title: Marion Seville
cards.text: Marion gets +2 bullets while he is wanted.
cards.flavor: "Last man to point out that 'Marion' sounds like a girl's name had to go find himself a girl's name." - Pancho Castillo

cards.title: Sanford Taylor
cards.text: Noon, Boot: Call out a dude at this deed. If Sanford is wanted, the call-out cannot be refused.
cards.flavor: "Sanford has it out for lawmen.  Rumor has it he met Ghost Creek's former sheriff on the road, and gunned her down for fun." - Jonah Essex

cards.title: Barton Everest
cards.text: If you reveal a cheatin' hand in Barton's shootout, raise your draw hand rank by 1 for this round..
cards.flavor: "The real crime is letting a fool keep his money."

cards.title: Pancho Castillo
cards.flavor: "I don't think the madame was too upset that I stole her jewels. Her heart?  That's a different story."

cards.title: Jonah Essex
cards.text: Other wanted dudes in Jonah's posse get +1 bullets.
cards.flavor: "True power is not in a name or a bauble, but in your resolve.  Yes, we follow you because you are Sloane.  But you are Sloane because we follow you."

cards.title: Silas Aims
cards.text: Silas's bullets are equal to his bounty.
cards.flavor: "My brother might not care about the enemies he makes.  That's because I do it for him."

cards.title: Sloane
cards.text:
Sloane's bounty cannot be reduced below 1.
Sloane and your other dudes at her location do not boot when forming or joining a posse.
cards.flavor: "She wants this hellhole so badly, I've half a mind to give it to her." - Dave Montreal

cards.title: Clementine Lepp
cards.text: While in a Saloon you own, Clementine gets +1 influence and cannot be called out.
cards.flavor: "I have yet to make headway with her, but, give me time." - Pancho Castillo

cards.title: Olivia Jenks
cards.flavor: That schoolmarm don't take no guff.  She's as good with a gun as she is with the kids.

cards.title: Ramiro Mendoza
cards.text:
Whenever Ramiro joins a posse, pay 1 ghost rock.
If you do not or cannot pay, discard him.
cards.flavor: "Hired guns aren't anything new.  Never met one who charges by the bullet before." - Lane Healey

cards.title: Steele Archer
cards.flavor: "For the right price, I can get you the information you need."

cards.title: Travis Moone
cards.text: React, Boot: At the start of the game, shuffle your play hand into your deck and draw 5 cards.
cards.flavor: "Oops, I messed that trick up!  Lemme try again."

cards.title: Androcles Brocklehurst
cards.text: Noon, Boot: Choose another player's dude at a deed you own but don't control. Gain ghost rock equal to that dude's influence.
cards.flavor: "You have a court date in front of Judge Somerset?  I'm afraid I will have to double my rate."

cards.title: Steven Wiles
cards.flavor: "Sometimes you need an extra set of guns.  I learned not to ask about his past.  Just pay him, thank him, and walk away.  But no man ends up like him without a story." - Dave Montreal

cards.title: Dr. Dawn Edwards
cards.text: If you discard Dawn as a casualty, you may search your deck for Eve Henry (if you don't already have her in play), and play her for free at this location. Shuffle your deck.

cards.title: Clint Ramsey
cards.flavor: "I do believe you are right, Kevin.  That is the same mane we saw in the North." - Ivor Hawley

cards.title: Eve Henry
cards.text: If you discard Eve as a casualty, you may search your deck for Dr. Dawn Edwards (if you don't already have her in play), and play her for free at this location. Shuffle your deck.

cards.title: Bank of California
cards.text: Players cannot take ghost rock from the Bank's controller.
cards.flavor: Would you care to make a deposit?

cards.title: Pony Express
cards.text: Controller Noon, Boot: Discard a card to draw a card.
cards.flavor: "It appears that Mrs. Morgan is on her way back, and that the claims were legitimate." - Max Baine

cards.title: Gomorra Parish
cards.text: Controller Noon, Boot: Ace a card from your hand to gain 1 ghost rock.
cards.flavor: "Reverend Inbody can stir the soul like no other." - Abram Grothe

cards.title: The Town Hall
cards.text: Controller React, Boot: At the start of the Upkeep phase, choose a dude at this location. Lower that dude's upkeep by their influence.
cards.flavor: "Now all we need is a Mayor to run it." - Dave Montreal

cards.title: 1st Baptist Church
cards.text: Raise the controller's hand size by one.
cards.flavor: "We are the servants of the God of heaven and earth, and build the house that was builded these many years ago." - Ezra 5:11

cards.title: Yan Li's Tailoring
cards.text: Controller Noon, Boot: Raise a dude's influence by 1.

cards.title: B & B Attorneys
cards.text: Controller Noon, Boot: Raise or lower the bounty on a wanted dude by one (if the bounty goes to zero, the dude is no longer wanted).
cards.flavor: Not sure who's more hated here… the criminals or those who defend 'em.

cards.title: Dead Dog Tavern
cards.text: Determine control of this deed using bullets instead of influence.
cards.flavor: "Keep runnin' your mouth and the 'dog' won't be the only one dead." - Clyde Owens

cards.title: Charlie's Place
cards.text: Controller Noon, Boot: Raise or lower the bullets of a dude at this location by 2.
cards.flavor: "Charlie Landers?  He's mostly retired.  He owns the saloon, but he spends most of his time on the road.  Says this town has too many bad memories."

cards.title: Pearly's Palace
cards.text: Controller React, Boot: After a shootout starts but before any player makes a Shootout play, make a Shootout play.

cards.title: Killer Bunnies Casino
cards.text: The controller of this deed may discard one additional card each Sundown phase.
cards.flavor: "The drinks might be a bit watered down, but Clementine more than makes up for it with her beauty." - Pancho Castillo

cards.title: Stagecoach Office
cards.text: Controller React, Boot: When you bring a non-token dude into play, place that dude at any location you control.
cards.flavor: Drivers Wanted

cards.title: Blake Ranch
cards.flavor: "My family has been raising horses since my great-grandfather.  And lemme tell ya Elander, that mechanical monster is no horse." - Jarrett Blake

cards.title: Cattle Market
cards.text:
This deed has 1 control point if another Ranch is in play.
All dudes have their value raised by 3 while at this deed.

cards.title: Circle M Ranch
cards.text: Controller Noon, Boot: If you have 3 or fewer cards in your play hand, draw a card.

cards.title: Pat's Perch
cards.flavor: "No one is sure who Pat is, but there seems to be activity out there." - Dave Montreal

cards.title: Bunkhouse
cards.text: Dudes with 0 or 1 influence, excluding any modifiers from this deed, have +1 influence while at this deed.

cards.title: Morgan Research Institute
cards.text: Controller Noon, Boot: Raise or lower the skill rating of a dude at this location by 2 (the skills are Huckster, Blessed, Shaman, and Mad Scientist).

cards.title: Carter's Bounties
cards.text: Controller Shootout, Boot: Move your dude into your posse from any location.
cards.flavor: "Of course it is safe and profitable.  How do you think I was able to found this fine establishment?  Now go get 'em!" - Carter

cards.title: The Union Casino
cards.text: Controller Noon, Boot: Choose your dude at this location and pay any amount of ghost rock. Each other player may then pay any amount of ghost rock. If you paid at least 4 ghost rock more than any other player, your dude permanently gets 1 control point.

cards.title: Jackson's Strike
cards.flavor: "You leave him alone, he'll leave you alone.  Let's not learn that lesson again." - Max Baine

cards.title: Undertaker
cards.text: This deed's controller gains 2 ghost rock each time an in-play dude is aced.
cards.flavor: The real money isn't in mining or cattle.  It's in death.

cards.title: General Store
cards.text: Controller Noon, Boot: Attach a goods or spell (as shoppin'), reducing the cost of that card by 2 ghost rock.

cards.title: The Pharmacy
cards.text: Controller Noon, Boot: Unboot a dude.
cards.flavor: "Their elixir has kept me from illness, so far." - Pancho Castillo

cards.title: Railroad Station
cards.text: Controller Noon, Boot: Move your dude from this location to another location (without booting).
cards.flavor: "I'm here to pick up the shipment… and to guarantee your silence." - Ivor Hawley

cards.title: Telegraph Office
cards.text: Controller Noon, Boot: Choose a dude that was brought into play this Noon phase. Gain ghost rock equal to the dude's influence.

cards.title: Pair of Six-Shooters
cards.text: Cheatin' Resolution, Boot: One card in your draw hand changes to the suit and value of your choice.
cards.flavor: "One works. Two work better." - Fred Aims

cards.title: Bluetick
cards.text: Noon, Boot: Move this dude to the same location as a wanted dude.
cards.flavor: "One of those fellers gets your scent, you ain't gettin' away lest you shoot it.  Of course you do that, you may as well get your own rope." - Silas Aims

cards.title: Peacemaker
cards.text: This dude cannot be changed to a draw, and cannot have their bullets lowered by another player's Shootout ability.
cards.flavor: "I wish I could say it brings me peace, or that it brings it to those I am forced to ise it on.  The one thing it brings, is justice." - Abram Grothe

cards.title: Shotgun
cards.text: Shootout, Boot: Choose and ace an opposing dude in this shootout with a value less than or equal to this dude's bullets.

cards.title: Whiskey Flask
cards.text: Noon, Boot: Boot this dude and discard a card from your hand to draw a card.
cards.flavor: "Just a little nip will keep you going all day." - Pancho Castillo

cards.title: Mustang
cards.text: Noon, Boot: Move this dude (without booting).
cards.flavor: "Mustangs like to roam.  I do my best to raise them that way." - Jarrett Blake

cards.title: Pearl-Handled Revolver
cards.text: This dude is a stud.
cards.flavor: "I took this from a deputy I killed down south.  The trigger is so smooth you barely even have to squeeze." - Sanford Taylor

cards.title: Roan
cards.text: React, Boot: Prevent this dude from booting when they join a posse (this does not allow a booted dude to join a posse).
cards.flavor: "Let the horse guide you.  He knows the way better'n you do." - Jon Longstride

cards.title: Auto-Revolver
cards.text: You may equip this Gadget as a Shootout play (pay all costs). While this Auto-Revolver is in a shootout and you are forming a draw hand, when you redraw after discarding at least one card, you may draw one extra card.

cards.title: Pinto
cards.text: Shootout, Boot: Move this dude into a posse (without booting; this can move a booted dude).

cards.title: Flame-Thrower
cards.text: This dude is a stud. Shootout, Pay 1–3 Ghost Rock, Boot: Raise the bullets on this Gadget by 1 for each ghost rock spent. Each round's loser takes 1 extra casualty.

cards.title: Force Field
cards.text: Repeat Resolution, Pay X Ghost Rock: Raise your draw hand rank by X for this round, but not to exceed your opponent's hand rank.
cards.flavor: "Mr. Aimslee, so you think you can make them bigger?  Big enough to protect a coach, or even a herd?" - Max Baine

cards.title: Quickdraw Handgun
cards.text: Cheatin' Resolution, Boot: If you have a legal draw hand, exchange draw hands with the cheatin' player. Cheatin' cards cannot be played on you for this round of the shootout.
cards.flavor: "Olivia carries hers everywhere, Dave.  Gomorra is dangerous." - Wylie Jenks

cards.title: Mechanical Horse
cards.text: Repeat Noon, Pay 2 Ghost Rock: Move this dude. React, Boot: Prevent this dude from booting when they join a posse (this does not let a booted dude join a posse).

cards.title: Tin Star
cards.text: Wanted dudes cannot refuse a call-out from this dude.
cards.flavor: "I follow the path of truth and honor.  If I ever stray, this badge and God's word will lead me back." - Abram Grothe

cards.title: Doyle's Hoyle
cards.text: React, Boot: After this dude makes a pull, discard the pull to replace it with this card. Resolution, Boot: Discard a card from your draw hand to replace it with this card. If the discarded card was a 2, raise your hand rank by one.

cards.title: Buffalo Rifle
cards.text: If this dude is adjacent to the location of a shootout or a job's mark, they can join a posse, without moving or booting, even if booted.

cards.title: Legendary Holster
cards.text: Shootout Pull, Boot: If the pull is lower than this dude's bullets, ace one dude in the opposing posse.
cards.flavor: "Remember the holster is a tool to make you stronger.  But your strength within must be far greater." - Jonah Essex

cards.title: Auto Cattle-Feeder
cards.text: After this is invented, attach it to a Ranch that you control. Controller Noon, Boot: Gain 1 ghost rock.
cards.flavor: "Who cares if it's safe?  It works and it makes us money." - Eustace True

cards.title: Soul Blast
cards.text: Shootout Hex X, Boot: Choose a dude in this shootout. X is that dude's grit. If successful, send the dude home booted. If successful by 6 or more, ace the dude instead. If unsuccessful, move this Huckster home booted.

cards.title: Ace in the Hole
cards.text: React Hex 6, Boot: When you reveal your draw hand in a shootout, boot this Huckster. Ace a card in your draw hand. Replace it with a card from your play hand.
cards.flavor: "Things are not always what they seem, friend." - Steele Archer

cards.title: Shadow Walk
cards.text: Noon Hex 7, Boot: Move this Huckster to any location. Shootout Hex 7, Boot: Move this Huckster to join your posse. You may make another Shootout play.

cards.title: Blood Curse
cards.text: Noon Hex 9, Boot: A dude at this or an adjacent location gets –1 influence and –1 bullets. Shootout Hex 9, Boot: One opposing dude gets –2 bullets.
cards.flavor: Feelin' queasy there, pardner?

cards.title: Raising Hell
cards.text: Shootout Hex 8, Boot: Ace a card from your play hand. One Abomination from your Boot Hill enters play (pay all costs) and joins this Huckster's posse. Ace this card.

cards.title: Establishin' Who's in Charge
cards.text: Noon Job: Mark an in-town deed. If successful, the deed permanently gains 1 control point.
cards.flavor: "You're right, a little piece of paper from the bank isn't what makes this land mine.  It's that little piece of paper and my friends with the guns." - Lane Healey

cards.title: Hired Guns
cards.text: Noon: Place a dude from your discard pile into your hand.
cards.flavor: Their aim don't matter if there's enough of 'em.

cards.title: Lady Luck
cards.text: Noon: You can discard as many of your cards as you like during Sundown.
cards.flavor: "It seems that Lady Luck was smiling upon me.  Turns out that she was just leading me on before shooting me in the back." - Steele Archer

cards.title: Bottom Dealin'
cards.text: Cheatin' Resolution: Discard the cheatin' player's draw hand and replace it with the top five cards of your deck (those cards still go to your discard pile).

cards.title: Make the Smart Choice
cards.text: Shootout: Reduce a dude's bullets by their influence. The dude's controller may move them home booted (even if already booted).
cards.flavor: "The best way to win a fight is to avoid the fight altogether." - Dave Montreal

cards.title: Tresspassin'
cards.text: Noon: Choose a Private deed you own. Other players' dudes there must move home booted, or gain 1 bounty each.
cards.flavor: "Fred, next time we need to hole up someplace, we should probably make sure whoever's there ain't worse than the law." - Silas Aims

cards.title: Auction
cards.text: Noon: Choose a deed in play. It becomes Private. If you own and control that deed, gain 1 ghost rock for each dude controlled by another player at that deed.

cards.title: The Stakes Just Rose
cards.text: Shootout: Move one of your dudes into your posse. That dude becomes a stud.
cards.flavor: "You didn't expect the sheriff to come alone, did you?" - Lucy Clover

cards.title: Sun in Yer Eyes
cards.text: Shootout: Choose a dude in this shootout. That dude gets –2 bullets (minimum 0) and becomes a draw.
cards.flavor: Duel at high noon? Make it six a.m. I do my killing before breakfast.

cards.title: Ambush
cards.text: Noon Job, Boot: Mark a dude. If the mark is not wanted, raise the bounty on each dude in your posse by 1. If successful, ace the mark.
cards.flavor: "Going somewhere, Hoss?  The boss wants to talk to you." - Fred Aims

cards.title: Coachwhip!
cards.text: Cheatin' Resolution: The cheatin' player must boot one of their dudes. If in a shootout, that dude gets aced instead. If you have a legal hand, you choose the dude to boot or ace.

cards.title: War Paint
cards.text: Noon: One of your dudes gets +2 bullets.
cards.flavor: "They do it to intimidate their enemies.  Since you are taking the herd the long way around to avoid them, it obviously worked." - Jon Longstride

cards.title: Bad Company
cards.text: Noon: Choose a wanted dude. That dude gets +3 bullets and is a stud. If any player collects bounty on that dude this turn, they gain 4 extra ghost rock.
cards.flavor: "They'd never have put such a bounty on my head if they thought anybody'd live to claim it." - Jonah Essex

cards.title: Hiding in the Shadows
cards.text: Noon: Choose one of your dudes. Other players cannot choose or affect that dude with Shootout abilities.

cards.title: Pistol Whip
cards.text: Shootout: Boot your dude in this posse to send a dude in the other posse home booted. Your dude gets –1 bullets (minimum 0).
cards.flavor: "Why waste the bullet?" - Wendy Cheng

cards.title: Concealed Weapons
cards.text: Noon: Your dudes may attach goods and spells (as Shoppin') at any location, and as Shootout plays.
cards.flavor: "What else have you got under that dress?" - Pancho Castillo

cards.title: Hot Lead Flyin'
cards.text: React: After you take casualties for losing a round of a shootout, pull. For each dude you discarded or aced as a casualty this round with a value higher than the pull, the winner takes 1 casualty.
cards.flavor: "The more people you have shooting, the more chance of someone getting hit." - Steven Wiles

cards.title: One Good Turn…
cards.text: Noon: Draw a card. Cheatin' Resolution: Gain 3 ghost rock.

cards.title: Kidnappin'
cards.text: Noon Job, Boot: Mark a dude. Your posse must have more total bullets than the marked dude. Raise the bounty of each dude in your posse by 1. If successful, discard the mark.
cards.flavor: "Welcome to the circus!" - Bobo

cards.title: Pinned Down
cards.text: Shootout: Choose a dude. They must be selected as the first casualty. If that dude is chosen as the shooter, they get –3 bullets (minimum 0).
cards.flavor: Pokin' out your head is liable to get it blown clean off.

cards.title: Run 'Em Down!
cards.text: Noon: Choose any number of your dudes, each with a Horse, at one location. Move them to an adjacent location that has an opposing dude without a Horse. Boot that dude. You may call that dude out.
cards.flavor: "You can run, but - actually, scratch that.  You can't run." - Lane Healey

cards.title: Bounty Hunter
cards.text: Noon: A 2-stud Gunslinger token enters play at a wanted dude's location. The Gunslinger calls out that dude, who cannot refuse. Remove the Gunslinger token from the game after the shootout.

cards.title: Reserves
cards.text: Noon: Gain 1 ghost rock.
cards.flavor: "Even in these forsaken parts, I find it pays to sock something away for a rainy day." - Max Baine

cards.title: Rumors
cards.text: Noon: Choose a dude. That dude gets –1 influence while at any location except home.
cards.flavor: "A crazed gunman, a wild dog, a shabling horror - those I can handle.  Venomous words like these, I stay away from." - Abram Grothe

cards.title: Cheatin' Varmint
cards.text: Resolution: Pay 5 ghost rock to lower a player's draw hand by 2 ranks. Cheatin' Resolution: Lower a player's draw hand by 2 ranks.

cards.title: Fresh Horses
cards.text: Noon: Unboot all your Horses at one location. Any abilities on the Horses that have been used can be used an extra time.
cards.flavor: "I don't know what they're feeding those horses at the Morgan ranches, but it's given them the persistence of Death himself, plus the glossiest coats I've ever seen." - Pancho Castillo

cards.title: Magical Distraction
cards.text: Cheatin' Resolution: Discard a spell from your dude in this posse and pull. Your draw hand rank equals the value of your pull (to a maximum rank of 11).

cards.title: Extortion
cards.text: Noon: Choose a deed that you control but do not own. Gain ghost rock equal to its production.
cards.flavor: "Give a dimwit a gun and he thinks he's king of the whole danged world." - Philip Swinford

cards.title: Recruitment Drive
cards.text: Noon Job: Mark the town square (any player may oppose the job). If successful, put a dude or deed into play from your discard pile, reducing its cost by 5 ghost rock.
cards.flavor: I always have work for hardy folk who don't ask a lot of questions." - Ivor Hawley

cards.title: Unprepared
cards.text: Shootout: Choose a dude. Boot that dude and their attached cards. That dude gets –1 bullets and cannot use their abilities. Their attached cards lose all traits, abilities, and bullet bonuses.
cards.flavor: I told you.  I do my killing before breakfast.

cards.title: A Coach Comes to Town
cards.text: Noon Job: Mark the town square. If successful, gain 4 ghost rock. If not, each player with a dude in the opposing posse gains 4 ghost rock.
cards.flavor: "Mr. Baine, Lane Healey is doing an excellent job defending our shipments.  I just wish we didn't need the likes of him." - James Ghetty

cards.title: Hex Slingin'
cards.text: Resolution: Discard a Hex from your dude in this posse to raise your draw hand rank by 2.
cards.flavor: "Power comes not in might, but in knowing how to overcome might." - Jia Mien

cards.title: This is a Holdup!
cards.text: Noon: Boot your dude at a deed you don't own to take ghost rock from the owner up to the production of that deed. Raise the bounty on your dude by the amount of ghost rock taken.

cards.title: Clear Out!
cards.text: Noon: Move your dude to a deed that you own but do not control.
cards.flavor: "I'm getting sick of these freaks!  Can't a man get a moment of pieace around here?" - Tommy Harden

cards.title: Missed!
cards.text: Shootout: Unboot one of your dudes in this posse.
cards.flavor: "It ain't often you get a second chance like this.  Try not to waste it." - Jonah Essex

cards.title: Takin' Ya With Me
cards.text: React: After you take casualties for losing a round of a shootout, your opponent takes 1 casualty unless each dude in their posse has higher bullets than the highest bullets among your casualties.

cards.title: Good Stiff Drink
cards.text: Noon: Choose a dude's ability that has been used. That ability can be used another time.
cards.flavor: "Got anything stronger?" - Prescott Utter

cards.title: Point Blank
cards.text: Resolution: Boot your stud dude in this posse. Your opponent must ace a dude in their posse with lower bullets than your dude's bullets.
cards.flavor: At that kind of range, you're shure to hit something.

cards.title: A Secret Tunnel
cards.text: Noon: Move your dude from one in-town deed you own to another in-town deed you own (without booting). Make another Noon play.
cards.flavor: "It's a hoot watchin' the schoolmarm chasin' them 'Jackelope Gang' kids around town!" - Prescott Utter

cards.title: Joker (red)
cards.text:
This card is only used for draw hands and pulls.
You choose its suit and value. Ace the joker after use.

cards.title: Joker (black)
cards.text:
This card is only used for draw hands and pulls.
You choose its suit and value. Ace the joker after use.

cards.title: Gunslinger
cards.text: Cannot be included in decks. Remove this token from the game after this shootout.
